name: Bricks Crush - Free Puzzle And Brain Game
name_original: Bricks Crush - Free Puzzle And Brain Game
description:
Bricks Crush is a new highscores puzzle game in which you must try to find as many rectangles as you can in 180 seconds time limit! Simple but addicting gameplay with global leaderboards included - you play against people all around the world, submit your score to see who is the best!

How to play: Tap on 4 bricks on the screen in a way that each brick is a one corner of rectangle, the bricks must be of the same color! Remember, bigger rectangle you find the better score you get!

Features:

* simple but addicting gameplay
* global leaderboards included
* great fun for the whole family
* 100% free full version
* no In-App purchases

Note: If the game runs slow on your device, please turn off the explosion settings in a main menu.
